name: Island Explore
description:
Survival on the island reaching a new level! So many features you will not find in any similar game! You will have to collecting, mining diverse resources,crafting a lot of items: tools, wear, weapon, resources for more dificult for the more complicated craft. Defend yourself from wild animals and other dangers of the island. Island Explore - this is new adventure simulator of island survival with sandbox elements.

Features:
- Complete freedom of action!
- Hunting, building, gathering, craft, research - lets do what you like!
- Building houses on the island!
- Huge number of resource for crafting!
- Huge number of weapon for fight with wild animals!
- Explore Wilderness island!
- Create weapon and armor for survival!
